name: The Hidden Flame
description:
‘The Hidden Flame’ is a Metroidvania game designed for PC and MacOS, Using a controller or a keyboard, the player will journey through the school trying to make it back home, acquiring different abilities and powers along the way, slowly disrupting the balance by defeating optional and core bosses. Players will be asked to sharpen their pencils, as the Principal summons them to their office for a chat!

This was developed for my thesis, and my first game to every reach the publish stage, I hope you enjoy and any feedback would be of great help with future plans
